title: Online English Language Education Course Based on the Genette Theory Model

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Students participate in real-time video classes and asynchronous learning activities using personal devices, with comprehensive language proficiency assessment through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners improve English communication skills by 30%+ using Gagné’s Nine Events Instructional Model.
Learners effectively apply motivation and self-directed learning strategies in online environments.
Learners utilize English expressions and grammar rules with 80%+ accuracy in real-world contexts through project-based assessments.
Learners rate learning motivation and productivity at 4+ points (Likert 5-point scale) via post-class surveys.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
